sentences.en: a friend of Mark’s
sentences.cn: 马克的一个朋友

sentences.en: Avocado salad is a favourite of mine.
sentences.cn: 鳄梨色拉是我的最爱之一。

sentences.en: Barry had his nose put out of joint by Lucy's aloof sophistication.
sentences.cn: 露西的冷淡与世故使得巴里十分不快。

sentences.en: Generosity is its own form of power.
sentences.cn: 别低估了慷慨的力量。

sentences.en: Harry inherited the house and a sizeable chunk of land.
sentences.cn: 哈里继承了这座房子以及相当大的一片土地。

sentences.en: He knew what he wanted to do from the age of 14.
sentences.cn: 他14岁起就知道自己日后干什么了。

sentences.en: He was well acquainted with the literature of France, Germany and Holland.
sentences.cn: 他对于法国、德国和荷兰的文学了如指掌。

sentences.en: I don't want any more of that heavy stuff.
sentences.cn: 我再也不想碰那种麻烦事了。

sentences.en: I had obtained the authentic details about the birth of the organization.
sentences.cn: 我已经掌握了有关该组织诞生的可靠的详细资料。

sentences.en: Instead of complaining about what's wrong, be grateful for what's right.
sentences.cn: 别抱怨不好的事，要对好的事心存感恩。

sentences.en: Jordan, of all people, committed a flagrant foul.
sentences.cn: 就连乔丹也有过一次明目张胆的犯规。

sentences.en: Product inspection is the responsibility of the employees themselves.
sentences.cn: 检验产品是员工自己的责任。

sentences.en: Somehow Karin managed to cope with the demands of her career.
sentences.cn: 卡琳设法达到了其职业的要求。

sentences.en: the back of the house
sentences.cn: 房子的后部

sentences.en: the beauty of the scenery
sentences.cn: 景色之美

sentences.en: the cost of the meal
sentences.cn: 这顿饭的花费

sentences.en: the end of the day
sentences.cn: 一天的末了

sentences.en: The happiest are not those who own all the best things, but those who can appreciate the beauty of life.
sentences.cn: 最幸福的人们并不一定什么都是最好，只是他们懂得欣赏生活的美好。

sentences.en: the last scene of the movie
sentences.cn: 电影的最后一个场景

sentences.en: the length of the swimming pool
sentences.cn: 游泳池的长度

sentences.en: The letter merely restated the law of the land.
sentences.cn: 这封信只不过重复了一下土地法。

sentences.en: The turning point in the process of growing up is when you discover the core of strength within you that survives all hurt.
sentences.cn: 当你从内心深处找到一种可以忍受一切痛苦的坚强力量时，你的成长历程就会出现飞跃。

sentences.en: They have maintained their optimism in the face of desolating subjugation.
sentences.cn: 面对遭征服的悲惨命运，他们保持了乐观的态度。

sentences.en: this work is of great interest and value.
sentences.cn: 这项工作很重要也很有价值。

sentences.en: to be proud of sth
sentences.cn: 为某事自豪

sentences.en: What will be the effect of the alliance between IBM and Apple?
sentences.cn: 若IBM公司和苹果公司联手将会有什么效果呢？

sentences.en: When life gets hard and you want to give up, remember that life is full of ups and downs, and without the downs, the ups would mean nothing.
sentences.cn: 当生活很艰难，你想要放弃的时候，请记住，生活充满了起起落落，如果没有低谷，那站在高处也失去了意义。

phrases.tran_cn: ［表示最不可能或最料不到的事例］在所有…中（编编，就连，居然）

phrases.phrase: of all the nerve(或英 cheek)
of an evening (或 morning etc.) informal 非正式
phrases.tran_cn: 晚间（或早晨）的某个时候

trans.tran_en: used to show what a part belongs to or comes from
